00036 void MAsymPmtHists::BookHists(string sid)
00037 {
00038    fDir->cd();
00039 
00040    for (UInt_t i=0; i!=N_POLARIMETERS; i++) {
00041       for (BeamEnergySetIter iBE=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.begin(); iBE!=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.end(); ++iBE) {
00042          BookHistsPolarimeter((EPolarimeterId) i, *iBE);
00043       }
00044    }
00045 }

00049 void MAsymPmtHists::BookHistsPolarimeter(EPolarimeterId polId, EBeamEnergy beamE)
00050 {
00051    char hName[256];
00052    //char hTitle[256];
00053    string  strPolId = RunConfig::AsString(polId);
00054    string  strBeamE = RunConfig::AsString(beamE);
00055    Color_t color    = RunConfig::AsColor(polId);
00056 
00057    // t0
00058    TGraphErrors *grPmtV1T0VsMeas = new TGraphErrors();
00059    grPmtV1T0VsMeas->SetName("grPmtV1T0VsMeas");
00060    grPmtV1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00061    grPmtV1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerSize(1);
00062    grPmtV1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerColor(color);
00063 
00064    sprintf(hName, "hPmtV1T0VsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00065    o[hName] = new TH2F(hName, hName, 1000, 0, 1, 1000, 0, 1);
00066    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Measurement;V1 t_{0}, ns;");
00067    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPmtV1T0VsMeas, "p");
00068 
00069    TGraphErrors *grPmtS1T0VsMeas = new TGraphErrors();
00070    grPmtS1T0VsMeas->SetName("grPmtS1T0VsMeas");
00071    grPmtS1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00072    grPmtS1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerSize(1);
00073    grPmtS1T0VsMeas->SetMarkerColor(color);
00074 
00075    sprintf(hName, "hPmtS1T0VsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00076    o[hName] = new TH2F(hName, hName, 1000, 0, 1, 1000, 0, 1);
00077    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Measurement;S1 t_{0}, ns;");
00078    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPmtS1T0VsMeas, "p");
00079 
00080 }

00084 void MAsymPmtHists::Fill(const EventConfig &rc)
00085 {
00086    Double_t runId            = rc.fMeasInfo->RUNID;
00087    //UInt_t   fillId           = (UInt_t) runId;
00088    UInt_t   beamEnergy       = (UInt_t) (rc.fMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergy() + 0.5);
00089    Short_t  polId            = rc.fMeasInfo->fPolId;
00090    //Short_t  targetId         = rc.fMseMeasInfoX->target_id;
00091    //Char_t   targetOrient     = rc.fMseMeasInfoX->target_orient[0];
00092    Float_t  pmtV1T0          = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fPmtV1T0    * WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF;
00093    Float_t  pmtV1T0Err       = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fPmtV1T0Err * WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF;
00094    Float_t  pmtS1T0          = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fPmtS1T0    * WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF;
00095    Float_t  pmtS1T0Err       = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fPmtS1T0Err * WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF;
00096 
00097    // XXX
00098    //if (polId == 3 && dl < 45) cout << "XXX DL: " << dl << endl;
00099    //
00100 
00101    if (gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.find((EBeamEnergy) beamEnergy) == gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.end())
00102       return;
00103 
00104    //printf("XXX: %8.3f, %3d, %f, %f, %f, %f, %f\n", runId, 
00105    //   beamEnergy, asymmetry, asymmetryErr, ana_power, polarization,
00106    //   polarizationErr);
00107 
00108    char hName[256];
00109 
00110    string strPolId = RunConfig::AsString((EPolarimeterId) polId);
00111    string strBeamE = RunConfig::AsString((EBeamEnergy) beamEnergy);
00112 
00113    TGraphErrors *graphErrs = 0;
00114    UInt_t        nPoints   = 0;
00115 
00116    // t0
00117    sprintf(hName, "hPmtV1T0VsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00118    graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPmtV1T0VsMeas");
00119    nPoints = graphErrs->GetN();
00120    graphErrs->SetPoint(nPoints, runId, pmtV1T0);
00121    graphErrs->SetPointError(nPoints, 0, pmtV1T0Err);
00122 
00123    sprintf(hName, "hPmtS1T0VsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00124    graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPmtS1T0VsMeas");
00125    nPoints = graphErrs->GetN();
00126    graphErrs->SetPoint(nPoints, runId, pmtS1T0);
00127    graphErrs->SetPointError(nPoints, 0, pmtS1T0Err);
00128 
00129 }

00139 void MAsymPmtHists::UpdateLimits()
00140 {
00141 
00142    for (PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId=gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin(); iPolId!=gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00143    {
00144       for (BeamEnergySetIter iBE=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.begin(); iBE!=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.end(); ++iBE)
00145       {
00146          string strPolId = RunConfig::AsString(*iPolId);
00147          string strBeamE = RunConfig::AsString(*iBE);
00148 
00149          Double_t xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax;
00150          Double_t yMean, yRms;
00151          TH1* h = 0;
00152 
00153          //sprintf(hName, "hPmtV1T0VsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00154          h = (TH1*) o["hPmtV1T0VsMeas_"+strPolId+"_"+strBeamE];
00155 
00156          TGraphErrors *graph = (TGraphErrors*) h->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPmtV1T0VsMeas");
00157 
00158          utils::RemoveOutliers(graph, 2, 2);
00159 
00160          graph->ComputeRange(xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00161          //xdelta = fabs(xmax - xmin)*0.1;
00162          //ydelta = fabs(ymax - ymin)*0.1;
00163 
00164          yMean = graph->GetMean(2);
00165          yRms  = graph->GetRMS(2);
00166 
00167          h->GetXaxis()->SetLimits(xmin, xmax);
00168          //h->GetYaxis()->SetLimits(ymin-ydelta, ymax+ydelta);
00169          h->GetYaxis()->SetLimits(yMean-3*yRms, yMean+3*yRms);
00170          //h->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(yMean-3*yRms, yMean+3*yRms);
00171 
00172          //
00173          h = (TH1*) o["hPmtS1T0VsMeas_"+strPolId+"_"+strBeamE];
00174 
00175          graph = (TGraphErrors*) h->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPmtS1T0VsMeas");
00176 
00177          utils::RemoveOutliers(graph, 2, 2);
00178 
00179          graph->ComputeRange(xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax);
00180          //xdelta = fabs(xmax - xmin)*0.1;
00181          //ydelta = fabs(ymax - ymin)*0.1;
00182 
00183          yMean = graph->GetMean(2);
00184          yRms  = graph->GetRMS(2);
00185 
00186          h->GetXaxis()->SetLimits(xmin, xmax);
00187          //h->GetYaxis()->SetLimits(ymin-ydelta, ymax+ydelta);
00188          h->GetYaxis()->SetLimits(yMean-3*yRms, yMean+3*yRms);
00189          //h->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(yMean-3*yRms, yMean+3*yRms);
00190       }
00191    }
00192 }
